channel.title: API Proxy :: CIS 526 Textbook
channel.description: Connecting to our RESTful API Now that we have the basic structure of our application built and are becoming more familiar with both Vue and PrimeVue, letâ€™s work on connecting to our backend RESTful API application and see if we can retrieve some data from our database. This is really the key feature that we want ensure works in our frontend application! First, we need a way to run our backend application at the same time, and also we want to be able to connect to it directly through our frontend.
